alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Lincoln; Marathon; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:31AM CDT until June 15 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN...NORTHEASTERN MARATHON...WESTERN LANGLADE AND WESTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 431 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Merrill to 9 miles west of Antigo to 7 miles north of Bevent, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Dutch Corners around 440 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Parrish, Veterans Memorial County Park, Antigo and Pearson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
